schema.description: Tunnel routes changed.

local-lsp-id.description: LSP ID of the primary tunnel.

ingress-lsr-id.description: Ingress LSR ID of the primary tunnel.

egress-lsr-id.description: Egress LSR ID of the primary tunnel.

tunnel-admin-status.description: Indicates the management status of the tunnel.

tunnel-oper-status.description: Indicates the operating status of the tunnel.

schema.description: The LDP session status is Down.

if-index.description: Indicates the index of the interface that discovers the neighbor.

ssn-rec-unknown-msg-errs.description: Number of unknown types of messages received by the session.

ssn-rec-unknown-tlv-errs.description: Number of unknown TLVs received by the session.

ldp-entity-index.description: The index for the LDP entry.

if-name.description: Name of an LDP peer interface.

schema.description: The LDP session status changes.

session-type.description: LDP session type: - Local - Remote - Local and remote.

sub-reason.description: Detailed cause for an alarm When an LDP session goes Down because an incorrect packet or a Notify message is received, the specific error packet type or Notify message type is displayed. For example: - Incorrect LDP ID carried in the packet(1) - Incorrect version number carried in the packet(2) - Incorrect PDU length(3) - Incorrect message length(5) - Incorrect TLV carried in the packet(7) - The received Notify message indicates that the Hello packet times out(9) - The received Notify message indicating a shutdown instruction(10) - The received Notify message indicates the keepalive message times out(20) When an LDP session goes Down because an incorrect socket is received, the detail error reason or an error code is displayed. For example: - Tcp connection reset by peer(54) - Tcp connection time out(60) This field is 0 if the LDP session goes Down due to other causes.

if-index.description: Indicates the index of the interface that discovers the neighbor.

ssn-rec-unknown-msg-errs.description: Number of unknown types of messages received by the session.

ssn-rec-unknown-tlv-errs.description: Number of unknown TLVs received by the session.

ldp-entity-index.description: The index for the LDP entry.

if-name.description: Name of an LDP peer interface.

schema.description: The sequence number of an Initialization message exceeded the threshold of MPLS LDP entity Initialization session and the threshold is not zero.

init-session-threshold.description: Indicates the number of attempts for session negotiation through Init messages.

schema.description: This alarm is generated when the LDP virtual tunnel goes Down.

ldp-virtual-tunnel-fec.description: FEC for a virtual LDP tunnel.

schema.description: This alarm is generated when the LDP virtual tunnel goes Up.

ldp-virtual-tunnel-fec.description: FEC for a virtual LDP tunnel.

schema.description: MPLS LDP multi-link configurations are inconsistent.

effect-ka.description: KeepAlive value used by the LDP session.

effect-ta.description: LDP transport addresses used by the session.

vrf-index.description: VRF index of LDP session exists.

config-rmt-peer-ip.description: Configure the IP address of the remote session.

schema.description: MPLS LDP multi-link configurations became consistent.

vrf-index.description: VRF index of LDP session exists.

config-rmt-peer-ip.description: Configure the IP address of the remote session.

schema.description: The lsp count exceeds the threshold.

lsp-total-count.description: Upper limit of LSPs which supported MPLS LSP protocol.

schema.description: The lsp count falls from the threshold.

lsp-total-count.description: Upper limit of LSPs which supported MPLS LSP protocol.

schema.description: The lsp count reaches the upper limit.
The lsp count falls from the upper limit.
Static LSP went Down.

lsp-index.description: Indicates the index of the LSP.

in-segment-index.description: Indicates the inSegment index of a static LSP.

out-segment-index.description: Indicates the outbound interface index of a static LSP.

out-if-index.description: Indicates the outbound interface index of a static LSP.

lsp-name.description: Indicates the name of a static LSP.

lsp-status.description: Indicates the status of a static LSP.

out-if-name.description: Indicates the outbound interface name of a static LSP.

in-if-index.description: Indicates the inbound interface index of a static LSP.

in-if-name.description: Indicates the inbound interface name a static LSP.

reason-index.description: Indicates the reason that the static LSP down.

schema.description: Static LSP's status changes.

lsp-index.description: Indicates the index of the LSP.

in-segment-index.description: Indicates the inSegment index of a static LSP.

out-segment-index.description: Indicates the outbound interface index of a static LSP.

lsp-name.description: Indicates the name of a static LSP.

lsp-status.description: Indicates the status of a static LSP.

out-if-index.description: Indicates the outbound interface index of a static LSP.

out-if-name.description: Indicates the outbound interface name of a static LSP.

in-if-index.description: Indicates the inbound interface index of a static LSP.

in-if-name.description: Indicates the inbound interface name a static LSP.

reason-index.description: Indicates the reason that the static LSP down.

schema.description: The block label usage exceeds the threshold, which may affect the creation of BGP/L2VPNs.

block-label-total-count.description: Indicates the total number of block labels.

block-label-current-count.description: Indicates the number of used block labels.

block-label-threshold-upper-limit.description: Indicates the upper limit of block label usage.

block-label-threshold-lower-limit.description: Indicates the lower limit of block label usage.

schema.description: The block label usage falls from the threshold.

block-label-total-count.description: Indicates the total number of block labels.

block-label-current-count.description: Indicates the number of used block labels.

block-label-threshold-upper-limit.description: Indicates the upper limit of block label usage.

block-label-threshold-lower-limit.description: Indicates the lower limit of block label usage.

schema.description: The block label count reaches the upper limit.

block-label-total-count.description: Indicates the maximum number of block labels supported by the device.

block-label-current-count.description: Indicates the number of block labels that are currently used on the device.

schema.description: The block label count falls from the upper limit.

block-label-total-count.description: Indicates the maximum number of block labels supported by the device.

block-label-current-count.description: Indicates the number of block labels that are currently used on the device.

schema.description: The peer address count reaches the upper limit.

address-total-count.description: Total number of addresses supported by the system.

schema.description: The peer address count falls from the upper limit.
The number of LDP label mapping sent or received on the device exceeded the upper limit.

mapping-total-count.description: Total number of LDP mapping supported by the system.

schema.description: The number of LDP label mapping sent or received on the device falls from the upper limit.
The number of used MPLS resources on the interface board reached the maximum number.
The number of used MPLS resources on the interface fell below 95% of the maximum number.
